place.name: ESCLUSHAM
place.gazetteerText: ESCLUSHAM (Above and Below), two townships in Wrexham parish, Denbigh; on Offa's Dyke, near Wrexham. Acres, 2, 104 and 1, 687. Real property, £5, 748, (of which £1, 790 are in quarries, and £518 in mines;) and £4, 220. Pop., 493 and 745. Houses, 102 and 145. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
